Layer.Name: prodes-amz:accumulated_deforestation_1988_2007_biome
Layer.Title: Accumulated Deforestation in Amazon Biome - 1988/2007
Layer.Abstract: Accumulated deforestation commonly called by mask of deforestation for 1988/2007 to the Amazon biome.

Layer.Name: prodes-mata-atlantica:accumulated_deforestation_up_to_2016
Layer.Title: Accumulated Deforestation in Mata Atlântica Biome - 2000/2016
Layer.Abstract: Accumulated deforestation commonly called by mask of deforestation for 2000/2016 to the Mata Atlântica biome.

Layer.Name: prodes-caatinga:accumulated_deforestation_up_to_2016
Layer.Title: Accumulated Deforestation in Caatinga Biome - 2000/2016
Layer.Abstract: Accumulated deforestation commonly called by mask of deforestation for 2000/2016 to the Caatinga biome.

Layer.Name: prodes-pampa:cloud
Layer.Title: Cloud
Layer.Abstract: The cloud mask vector to all scenes of the yearly mosaics.

Layer.Name: prodes-pantanal:cloud
Layer.Title: Cloud
Layer.Abstract: The cloud mask vector to all scenes of the yearly mosaics.

Layer.Name: deter-amz:deter_amz
Layer.Title: DETER Daily - Anonymous
Layer.Abstract: For anonymous users. Filtered by areatotalkm >= 0.0625

Layer.Name: deter-amz:deter_public
Layer.Title: DETER Daily - Anonymous(legacy)
Layer.Abstract: For anonymous users. Used in producing maps until the new oauth2 tokenized engine is working. Filtered by areatotalkm >= 0.0625

Layer.Name: queimadas:focos_ams_48h
Layer.Title: Focos na América do Sul nas últimas 48 horas (todos os satélites)
Layer.Abstract: Focos de calor detectados por todos os satélites em toda a América do Sul nas últimas 48 horas.

Layer.Name: prodes-caatinga:temporal_mosaic_caatinga
Layer.Title: Caatinga Mosaic
Layer.Abstract: Mosaic composed by a set of Landsat images, and similar images, with temporal dimension enabled and yearly granularity.

Layer.Name: prodes-cerrado:temporal_mosaic_cerrado
Layer.Title: Cerrado Mosaic
Layer.Abstract: Mosaic composed by a set of Landsat images, and similar images, with temporal dimension enabled and yearly granularity.

Layer.Title: Legal Amazon Mosaic
Layer.Abstract: Mosaic composed by a set of Landsat images, and similar images, with temporal dimension enabled and yearly granularity.

Layer.Name: prodes-legal-amz:temporal_mosaic_legal_amazon_principal
Layer.Title: Legal Amazon Mosaic Principal
Layer.Abstract: Mosaic composed by a set of Landsat images, and similar images, with temporal dimension enabled and yearly granularity. Principal images

Layer.Name: prodes-legal-amz:temporal_mosaic_legal_amazon_secondary
Layer.Title: Legal Amazon Mosaic Secondary
Layer.Abstract: Mosaic composed by a set of Landsat images, and similar images, with temporal dimension enabled and yearly granularity. Secondary images

Layer.Name: prodes-mata-atlantica:temporal_mosaic_mata_atlantica
Layer.Title: Mata Atlantica Mosaic
Layer.Abstract: Mosaic composed by a set of Landsat images, and similar images, with temporal dimension enabled and yearly granularity.

Layer.Title: Pampa Mosaic
Layer.Abstract: Mosaic composed by a set of Landsat images, and similar images, with temporal dimension enabled and yearly granularity.

Layer.Title: Pantanal Mosaic
Layer.Abstract: Mosaic composed by a set of Landsat images, and similar images, with temporal dimension enabled and yearly granularity.
